mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT r.user_no, r.rsv_no, b.br_name, b.br_id, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = r.user_no) AS user_id, r.rsv_day, r.rsv_time, r.rsv_count, r.rsv_tel, r.rsv_price, r.rsv_name, r.rsv_state, r.rsv_fin_date, r.rsv_reply_yn, (select delete_yn from kap_user where user_no = r.user_no) as delete_yn FROM reserve r LEFT OUTER JOIN brewery b ON r.br_id = b.br_id ORDER BY r.rsv_no desc ) A WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and user_no = #{user_no} and delete_yn ='N' order by rsv_day desc )WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT o.order_no, o.user_no, o.order_amount, to_char(o.order_date, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI')as order_date, o.order_state, od.pd_reply_yn, od.orderdetail_no, od.pd_id, od.pd_price, od.cart_count, (select pd_name from product where pd_id = od.pd_id) as pd_name, (select pd_thumb from product where pd_id = od.pd_id) as pd_thumb, (select user_name from kap_user where user_no = o.user_no) as user_name, (select user_tel from kap_user where user_no = o.user_no) as user_tel, (select user_postcode from kap_user where user_no = o.user_no) as user_postcode, (select user_add from kap_user where user_no = o.user_no) as user_postadd, (select user_detailadd from kap_user where user_no = o.user_no) as user_detailadd, (select delete_yn from kap_user where user_no = o.user_no) as delete_yn FROM orders o LEFT OUTER JOIN orders_detail od ON o.order_no = od.order_no ORDER BY o.order_no desc ) A WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and user_no=#{user_no} and delete_yn ='N' order by orderdetail_no )WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from reserve where user_no=#{user_no}
select count(*) from orders where user_no=#{user_no}
SELECT count(od.orderdetail_no) as orderCount FROM orders o LEFT OUTER JOIN orders_detail od ON o.order_no = od.order_no where user_no = #{user_no}
SELECT qna_no, qna_title, to_char(qna_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as qna_date FROM qna where user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY qna_no desc
